content.description: Which of the following versions of the underlined portion of sentence 4 (reproduced below) best establishes the relationship between this sentence and the ideas expressed earlier in the paragraph?
content.question: Therefore, while the finding offers insight into ancient technological achievements, it actually only adds to the mystery of how Egyptâ€™s iconic monuments were built.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Use transitional elements to guide the reader through the line of reasoning of an argument.
